mode.name: Border color mode
mode.hint: Use Foundry disposition colors, a custom color, or colors based on health condition.

outlineColor.name: Outline Color
outlineColor.hint: Used only when Color mode is Custom. Default: #88ccff

targetOutlineColor.name: Target Outline Color
targetOutlineColor.hint: Used when Color mode is Custom and target highlighting is active. Sets the outline color for targeted tokens. Default: #88ccff

glowColor.name: Glow Color
glowColor.hint: Used when Color mode is Custom (and glow is not disabled). Sets the glow color. Default: #88ccff

targetGlowColor.name: Target Glow Color
targetGlowColor.hint: Used when Color mode is Custom and target highlighting is active. Sets the glow color for targeted tokens. Default: #88ccff

hideDefaultBorder.name: Hide Default Foundry Border
hideDefaultBorder.hint: Hide Foundryâ€™s built-in selection border on tokens.

disableOutline.name: Disable Outline
disableOutline.hint: If enabled, tokens will not render the custom outline.

enableTarget.name: Enable Target Border
enableTarget.hint: Also apply the outline/glow to tokens you target.

disableGlow.name: Disable Glow
disableGlow.hint: If enabled, tokens will not render the glow effect.

glowDistance.name: Glow Distance
glowDistance.hint: Glow radius in pixels. Larger values expand the glow outward.

glowOuterStrength.name: Glow Outer Strength
glowOuterStrength.hint: Intensity of the outer glow. Higher values are brighter.
